{{XC3FR|sublink}} }} '''Tirkins''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|ターキン}}, ''Tākin'', alternate plural form '''Tirkin''') are a recurring species of sentient bird-like humanoids in the {{XC|serieslink}}. They are a type of enemy in {{XC}}, {{TTGC}}, and {{XC3FR|sublink}}, and are both a race and an enemy family in {{XC2}} and {{XC3}}. Tirkins are similar in appearance to, and may be related to, [[Chilkin]]s, which look like white Tirkins, and [[Gulkin]]s, which look like blue Tirkins. In {{XC2|-}}, white Tirkins appear in cold regions and Chilkins do not. Aside from equipment and color, all Tirkins have the same appearance. [[Totem]]s can buff some Tirkin enemies in a similar manner to [[Standard]]s. == {{XC|-}} == Tirkins are humanoid enemies only found on the [[Bionis' Leg]]. They have the appearance of birds quite similar to parrots; however, they wear [[armour]] and carry [[Weapons (XC1)|weapons]] about with them. Many of them are sight monsters. There are many classes of Tirkins. A group of [[Kindred Enemy|kindred]] Tirkins can use [[Chain Attack (XC1)|Chain Attacks]]. The behaviour, adornments and social structure of Tirkins strongly suggest they are an intelligent race, but they can still be harmed by the [[Monado]] unlike the [[Homs]], [[Nopon]] and [[High Entia]]. === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Archer Tirkin (XC1)|Archer Tirkin]] * [[Brave Tirkin (XC1)|Brave Tirkin]] * [[Guard Tirkin (XC1)|Guard Tirkin]] * [[Javelin Tirkin (XC1)|Javelin Tirkin]] * [[Lancer Tirkin (XC1)|Lancer Tirkin]] * [[Ranger Tirkin]] * [[Sniper Tirkin]] * [[Spear Tirkin (XC1)|Spear Tirkin]] * [[Trainer Tirkin (XC1)|Trainer Tirkin]] === Quest Exclusive Enemy === * [[Arrogant Tirkin]] (during ''[[Earnest's Solitude]]'') === Unique Monsters === * [[Field Altrich]] * [[Sniper Paramecia]] * [[Trainer Harmelon]] * [[Vagrant Alfead]] == {{XCFC|sub}} == Tirkins appear on the [[Bionis' Shoulder]]. === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Archer Tirkin (XC1)|Archer Tirkin]] * [[Brave Tirkin (XC1)|Brave Tirkin]] * [[Spear Tirkin (XC1)|Spear Tirkin]] === Quest Exclusive Enemy === * [[Ramrod Tirkin]] (during ''[[Hekasa's Labour at Stake]]'') == {{XC2|-}} == Tirkin are found primarily in [[Gormott Province]]; they are quite similar to the Tirkin from {{XC|-}}. Tirkin are shown to be a civilized bird-like humanoid race, even being able to communicate with other races of [[Alrest]]. However, the majority of them appear to make their home in smaller settlements rather than living in villages or cities and also appear to be much more primitive compared to the other races of Alrest. Despite this, some Tirkin such as the [[Fire Dragons Member|Fire Dragons]] are shown to have integrated with the rest of Alrest society in positions such as chefs or guards. Tirkin NPCs speak in a pidgin dialect of Alrest's language, similar that spoken by [[Nopon]], with similar incomplete sentences. Furthermore, the spelling of certain words is highly simplified (e.g. "mek" for "make") and the hard "c" sound is always represented as a "k" (e.g. "kannot"). In the English dub, Tirkin are depicted speaking with Cockney accents. Tirkin have a small settlement named [[Tirkinlandia]] in the [[Kingdom of Tantal]]. === NPCs === * [[Head Fire Dragon]] (DLC) * [[Fire Dragons Member]] (DLC) * [[Omulette]] * [[Tirkin King]] === List of Enemies === A few named '''runners''' or '''scouts''' are used as scouts but this term can be used for other species. ==== Normal Minor Enemies ==== * [[Brave Tirkin (XC2)|Brave Tirkin]] * '''Titanium Supports''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It boosts the user's agility by a set amount when worn. It is used to complete [[Seeker]]'s [[Collectopaedia (XC3)|Collectopaedia Card]]. It can be bought from [[Prize X-change Red]], along with from [[Battlescar Caravan]]. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

'''Tool Belts''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{for|mechanics from other games|Topple}} {{Spoiler}} [[File:XC3 Topple Icon.png|thumb|Topple Icon]] '''Topple''' is a status in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It causes a [[Break (XC3)|broken]] target to be knocked to the ground. A Toppled enemy or character cannot move, attack, or evade for a set amount of time. A toppled target can then be either [[Launch (XC3)|launched]] or [[Daze (XC3)|dazed]].
Flying enemies may relieve themselves of Topple if they are toppled over a cliff, unlike previous games in the series. This often prevents them from being instantly killed if the cliff overlooks a bottomless pit or an otherwise fatal plunge.
Certain accessories and skills have various effects related to Topple: * The [[Beast-Hide Vest (XC3)|Beast-Hide Vest]], [[Muscle Belt (XC3)|Muscle Belt]] and [[Champion Belt (XC3)|Champion Belt]] accessories, and the Insult to Injury and Universal Annihilation skills from the [[Ogre]] and [[Seraph]] classes respectively, increase the user's damage output against toppled enemies; * The [[Graphite Kneeguard]], [[Lead Kneeguard]] and [[Metallic Kneeguard]] increase the wearer's resistance to Topple; * The [[White Belt (XC3)|White Belt]], [[Black Belt (XC3)|Black Belt]] and [[Platinum Belt (XC3)|Platinum Belt]] increase the duration of topples inflicted by the wearer.
== Topple-inflicting Arts == * [[Bull Rush]] ([[Heavy Guard]]) * [[Shield Bash (XC3)|Shield Bash]] ([[Guardian Commander]]; Master Art) * [[Crimson Lance]] ([[Seraph]]); Only inflicts Topple when attacking from the side. * [[Pirate Lariat]] ([[Triton]]) * [[Starfall (XC3)|Starfall]] ([[Royal Summoner]]) * [[Starlight Kick (XC1)|Starlight Kick]] ([[Melia]]) * [[Sudden Impact]] ([[Lanz]], [[Ouroboros]]); Only inflicts Topple when Interlink is at level 3. * [[Grand Priest]] ([[Taion]], Ouroboros); Only inflicts Topple when Interlink is at level 3. * [[Aquatic Missile]] ([[Soulhacker]]) * [[Winning Rush]] (Lanz, Ouroboros); inflicts Topple as part of a [[Launch (XC3)|Launch]] combo. * [[Final Lucky Seven]] ([[Noah]]); inflicts Topple as part of a [[Smash (XC3)|Smash]] combo.
=== In {{XC3FR|sub}} === * [[Shaker Edge (FR)|Shaker Edge]] ([[A]]) * [[Anchor Shot]] ([[Rex]]); Only inflicts Topple when attacking from the front. {{clr}}
